    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Working</description>
        <name>Check Date in schedule or Not</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[ var today = new GlideDate();
 gs.print('Current date is:' + today);

 var schedRec = new GlideRecord('cmn_schedule');
 schedRec.addQuery('name', '8-5 weekdays');
 schedRec.query();
 if (schedRec.next()){


     if (schedRec.isInSchedule(today)) { //First Mail
         gs.print('Date in Schedule' + today);

     } else {
         if(!schedRec.isInSchedule(today)) {
             today.addDays(1); //this will keep on adding days unless it is weekday
         }
         gs.print('Next Date in Schedule' + " "+today); //with this method you can schedule notification which will trigger on next working day.
     }
 }
 ]]></script>
